intro: Psychotria lorenciana, commonly known as the Lorenciana Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Ecuador and Peru. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, glossy leaves and produces small, white to greenish flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in montane forests. The plant has a complex chemical composition, containing various alkaloids that have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
